name: Cubint
description:
Gameplay

  • Shoot your way against waves of enemies
  • Get new Buffs and upgrade them
  • Get powerful Synergies by getting new Buffs
  • Choose different Spells for new and unique builds
  • Strengthen your Towers

Features

  • 20 Buffs to Upgrade
  • 60+ Spells to choose
  • 14 Synergies to build
  • 15 Tower upgrades
  • 33 waves of increasing difficulty
